1: The goal of the game is to destroy all the bricks by controlling the platform from which the ball bounces.
2: Controls: platform movement to the left - left arrow ( <- );
3: Platform movement to the right - right arrow ( -> )
4: Bonuses: slowing down the ball - a black ball in a blue frame;
5: Ball acceleration -- black ball in red frame;
6: Increase in the number of balls - 3 balls in a blue frame;
7: Platform extension - black platform in a blue frame;
8: Platform reduction - a black platform in a red frame.
